summary: Update the TypeScript SDK repository to use native NPM 7 workspaces instead of Lerna, now that Node 14 support was dropped. This issue became obsolete as the repository was later transitioned to PNPM.
userImpact: Developers contributing to the repository would benefit from simplified workspace tooling and updated build processes.
proposedFix: Migrate from Lerna to native NPM 7 workspaces and update to Lerna 7
resolutionDetails: Issue became inapplicable as the repository was transitioned to PNPM instead of implementing NPM 7 workspaces.
keyQuote: This is no longer applicable, as the repository has been transitioned to PNPM.
